name: Destiny
text: X is the number of icons ([star][boost]) on the card tucked under Glimpse of the future. Interrupt: When a boost card is turned faceup, give the enemy another boost card for this activation. Then discard one of them. (limit once per phase.)

name: Irene Adler
text: Setup: Search your deck a for a [[psionic ]]card and add it to your hand. (Shuffle.) Response: After you change to this form, shuffle a [[psionic ]]card from you discard pile into your deck.

name: Glimpse of the Future
text: Permanent. Setup. Action: Exhaust Glimpse of the Future → look at the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. Tuck one under this card so that only the boost field is visible and shuffle the other two into the encounter deck. At the end of the round, discard it

name: Mystique
text: Action: Exhaust Mystique and spend a resource of any type → heal 1 damage from your identity and ready it. (limit one per phase). "The game's afoot, Irene. Our game.”

name: Mental Awareness
text: Resource: Exhaust Mental Awareness → generate a [wild] resource for a [[psionic]] card. Destiny can focus on the most probable alternative futures.

name: Clairvoyance
text: Hero Action: Spend any number of [mental] resource (to a maximum of 3) and exhaust Clairvoyance → for each resource spent this way, choose a different scheme and remove X threat from it, where X is the number of icons ([star][boost]) on the card tucked under Glimpse of the future.

name: Unmask
text: Hero Action: Spend any number of [mental] resource (to a maximum of 3) and exhaust Unmask → for each resource spent this way, choose a different enemy and deal X damage to them, where X is the number of icons ([star][boost]) on the card tucked under Glimpse of the future.

name: Be Careful
text: Hero Interrupt: When you would take any amount of damage, spend 1 [mental] resource and exhaust Be Careful → prevent X of that damage, where X is the number of icons ([star][boost]) on the card tucked under Glimpse of the future.

name: Prescience
text: Forced Interrupt: When you reveal a treachery card, cancel its "When Revealed" effects and discard it. Then, discard Prescience.

name: Astral Projection
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme. Remove 1 additional threat for each icon ([star][boost]) on the card tucked under Glimpe of the Future. “We have to managed this immediate threat” - Destiny

name: Path of Violence
text: Action de héros (attack): Deal 4 damage to an enemy. Deal 1 additional damage for each icon ([star][boost]) on the card tucked under Glimpse of the Future. “Beware of him!” - Destiny

name: Unconditional Love
text: Action: If Mystique/Raven Darkhölme is in play, ready Mystique/Raven Darkhölme and Destiny/Irene Adler. Otherwise search your deck and discard pile for Mystique and add her to your hand. (Shuffle your deck.) “A rope through Time.”

name: Fragment Studies
text: Response: After you spend this card, shuffle 1 identity-specific card from your discard pile into your deck.
